description: A singleton object in Kotlin that loads and holds recipe data from a local JSON file within an Android application. It provides a method to load recipes from the raw resources using Gson to parse JSON into Recipe objects.

classes.name: RecipeData
classes.description: A singleton object responsible for loading and storing recipe data from a JSON resource.

methods.name: loadRecipes
methods.description: Loads recipes from the JSON file located in app's raw resources, parsing it into a list of Recipe objects. Ensures data is only loaded once.
